name: Stacy Bishop
text: The best sport-specific training facility in Tuscaloosa.

name: Caroline Taylor
text:
Check out JDPI Sports Performance if you're looking to lose, tone and burn.

Johnny and Duffy train high school football players for college teams and college football players for the NFL combine. So they're pretty good and know what they're doing. I'm not training for either, but with their help I've gone from completely inactive and overweight to being in the best shape (physically and mentally) of my life in the past few months. I've lost over 15 pounds and gained some awesome lean muscle mass, as well as stamina, agility, strength and coordination that I never knew I was capable of having.

They offer a free-trial class if you're interested in learning more about their style of training.

Check it out!

name: Lee Bolden
text: Great environment and awesome softball

name: Sheila Bryan
text: Great place to watch your grandkids play softball. Has great food and drinks.

name: Chris Childers
text: Nice clean facilities to watch a ball game

name: Krista Welch
text: Good fields, designed layout (you'll never get hit with a foul ball), fields aren't well numbered from parking lot, concessions  stand has really good food.

name: Jason knowles
text: Chris Browning and staff are great guys. They take the time to train and educate your kids about the game of baseball.

name: Barnacle Bill
text: Among all the other locations this one is the least desirable. The Pelham location offers so much more in a more updated facility. Don’t waste your time here. 👎👎

resp.text: Hi Bill! Glad you are enjoying the Pelham location.  Members get to enjoy multi-club access. While Hoover may not have the glitz and glam of our newer locations, it is special to 24e. Hoover was our very first location and has an "Old School" vibe and equipment you would be hard pressed to find anywhere else. So show us some love and consider giving us 5 stars. Thanks and Happy New Year!!

name: LaDarren Smith
text: BYSWO Fitness Trains out of this funk and it is the absolute best for those looking to take their fitness to another level! byswofitness.com can help with personal training and nutrition coaching

name: Christopher Peters
text: One of the best gyms in Birmingham with multiple locations

resp.text: Thanks Christopher!! So great to hear you are enjoying 24e. It's an honor to serve our awesome members!

name: WADE COLEMAN
text: Awesome gym, awesome environment. Great variety of equipment too.

name: Philip Duchock
text: Decent gym, a little small but conviemient for those who work odd hours. Customer service is good but im not a fan of the contract would recommend for locals near by.

name: Devin M Chapman
text: Clean, neutral environment. Great place to get some work in and be your self.

name: JaCorey Murray
text: I've been with this gym since 2012 and no complaints. Love the free weights, space and ability to come at any time of the day. If you're looking for a personal trainer, I'll recommend Nicolette Hayes. She is very talented and has a wide range of options to help with general cardio and strength conditioning. She'll also take the time to understand and customize your workout.

resp.text: Hi JaCorey! Thanks for taking the time to leave a great review. We are so thankful to have you at 24e for all these years. It is an honor. Thank you!!!

name: Jason Harmon
text:
Knowledgeable management and friendly.
Most adequate facilities for facilitating better health. Highly recommend

name: Carlos Cumpiano
text: This is a great gym. The staff is great. Very friendly people and like to make sure they have relationships with their members. It’s a little more than PF black card but well worth the price. Everyone that goes wants to work and better themselves.

name: Sabrina Gaddy
text: Luv 24e! It's a modern 'old school' style gym. Fantastic equipment & lots of it! Also lot of free weights! Open 24 hrs which is so awesome for those of us who work weird hours. Staff is great! always cheerful &  happy to assist!  Luv this gym!!

resp.text: Thank you, Sabrina!

name: Tommie Wisaeu
text: Honestly, this gym is EASILY the BEST gym I've been to. Nothing else comes close. Well, maybe a gym that costs 3x as much will be as good, but why bother when this gym is clean, has all of the equipment you could possibly need, and staff that genuinely cares. Price is fair, all the equipment works, plenty of changing rooms and bathrooms, private showers, this gym is as good as it gets.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Trent!! So thankful to have you at 24e!!

name: Bergen Bolt
text:
The best gym in town!
I've used several different local gyms over the years, and this one is far and away my favorite. The equipment is fantastic, the facility is large and open, the staff is knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly, and the other members are amazing. As a woman on a weight loss journey, it can be difficult to find a gym where it feels like I belong. And it's really cool to feel like I belong in a gym where bodybuilding athletes train!
The price is perfect and the service and support from staff is above and beyond! I recently had surgery and they called to check on me to make sure I was healing okay. I love this gym!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for those kind words!! It is truly a blessing to have such awesome members!! Thanks Bergen!!

name: Garrett Bell
text: This gym is great for anyone. The environment is very nice, with a good mix of beginners up to series bodybuilders. Mix of older and newer equipment which is very well maintained. Staff is friendly and helpful. I have and would recommend this gym to anyone. Gym gets fairly busy later in the day from 4-6pm but never to busy to get on the machines and weights you want to use. The best part is you can workout any time any day. For the most part there is always a few people working out.

name: Deep South
text: Best gym I have ever been a member of, common sense owner and staff.

name: Steve Trowbridge
text: Great Gym! Never packed, very clean, employees are great!

resp.text: Thanks Steve!! That is great to hear! We are thankful have such awesome members and staff!

name: David Rhodes
text: Team Swole, Whooo!

resp.text: Ha! That's right! Thanks for the five stars!!

name: Steven Johnson
text: I have been going to this gym since it opened. I love it because they have a lot of free weights and many different types. They even have lifting platforms with bumper style plates for Olympic and power lifting. I wouldn't go anywhere else. The owner and staff are top notch as well

name: Koinonia with God
text:
What makes 24e so special is my personal trainer, Hugheston. He is one of the most soft-hearted and intentional people I have ever met. Your goals become his goals and he somehow always manages to go the extra mile with you. I have spent my whole life away from the gym but he has transformed my negative perception of working out into a world of excitement and possibility. I never thought I could enjoy working out!

I'm always suspicious about trainers but he is not in it for the money, his motivation is in getting to transform your lives and I have gotten to see that first hand.

resp.text: Thank you, so much! We are certainly proud of Hugheston and are thankful for awesome members like you!!

name: Jim McFerrin
text: Best equipment and staff in town.

resp.text: Not to mention, the best members!! Thank you!

name: Bryan Gilbert
text: Best customer experience I’ve ever had at a business. Houston at the front desk was one of the friendliest people I’ve ever met. Give that man a raise.

name: B D
text: Best bang for buck ive ever gotten from a gym. Always open and it's good for people who really want to work out. Even though it's more of a bodybuilder gym, the crowd has always been really welcoming to whoever

name: Koinonia with God
text:
What makes 24e so special is my personal trainer, Hugheston. He is one of the most soft-hearted and intentional people I have ever met. Your goals become his goals and he somehow always manages to go the extra mile with you. I have spent my whole life away from the gym but he has transformed my negative perception of working out into a world of excitement and possibility. I never thought I could enjoy working out!

I'm always suspicious about trainers but he is not in it for the money, his motivation is in getting to transform your lives and I have gotten to see that first hand.

resp.text: Thank you, so much! We are certainly proud of Hugheston and are thankful for awesome members like you!!

name: Charles Perkins
text: Best fun I've ever been apart of. Love the staff love the environment of real lifters in there.

name: bwarren1975
text: I like this gym. Owner is cool. Employees are cool. Membership price is not bad.  Hammer strength equipment is good.

name: Craig Summerville
text: Why would you go anywhere else?  Definitely the best "bang for the buck", so to speak.  There are no other gyms in the area where you can spend $25.00 a month and have access to a gym 24 hours a day!  This makes it super convenient if you work odd hours.  The atmosphere is fantastic.  The equipment is modern, clean, and well maintained.  The staff is extremely friendly and knowledgeable.  So, I ask again, why would you go elsewhere?

name: Shaun Southward
text: Best gym in Birmingham. Only gym in town that gives you access to a full gym, that's 24/7 with no contract memberships. Staff was great, not stuffy like most places. $25 per month for this place is a steal

name: Marc Glass
text: 8 dollars daily. Great for travelers. Awesome gym, friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks Marc!!

name: Donald Watkins
text: I have some friends that work out here. its not for the faint of heart. if you are serious about getting fit and making it a lifestyle this may be the perfect gym for you.

name: Charlie Prince
text: Best gym I've ever been to. Clean, had whether you need the people and ut has a great culture of your serious about getting in shape.

name: J Spratling
text: I experienced the same poor service when I tried to cancel my membership.  Jack, the manager, was extremely unprofessional.  I would NOT recommend this gym to anyone.  There are several gyms in the Birmingham area.  You can easily find one that appreciates your business from the time you sign up to the time you cancel.  Do not go to this gym.

name: Kevin Wilkie
text: Great place to workout. Plenty of equipment and everything you need for a good workout!

resp.text: Thanks Kevin!

name: Austin Mann
text: Great staff, vibe, and equipment

name: Dylan Stephenson
text: Great place to go workout. it's also has a very friendly and helpful staff as well!

name: Michael Wallace
text: Great Gym.  They have all you need for a full body workout.  Employees are friendly and helpful.

name: Brent Harris
text: 24e fitness in Hoover is awesome, and the atmosphere is great. Hugheston is my personal trainer and I highly recommend him. We have great interaction, while he gives me valuable coaching techniques. Hugheston has also helped me with a great diet plan to help me achieve my goals. Thanks Hugheston!!

resp.text: Thank you, Brent! It is truly rewarding to have such awesome members and to hear that our trainers, like Hugheston, are making a difference!!

name: Grant Price
text: Great gym, Houghston helped me get in shape with a personal training program!

resp.text: Thanks Grant! We're so happy to hear that Hugheston is helping you meet your fitness goals!

name: frank baker
text: This is a beautiful facility convenient to research park.  It's nice to have a place to work out at lunch break.

name: Jay R
text: This is a clean, well run, locally owned business. 24e offers just about every service you'd want from a Health Club membership.

name: Jay R
text: This is a clean, well run, locally owned business. 24e offers just about every service you'd want from a Health Club membership.

name: Nannette Zeanah
text: I have used this gym for 5 years.  My family uses it as well.  I have lost 105 pounds.  Wow!  That's amazing isn't it!.  My son has lost over 100 pounds as well.  I couldn't have done it without the help of the staff and trainers.  I train with Hugheston at present.  He's amazing and very knowledgeable.  He is very conscientious and seems to care about his clients.  He helps me to do the exercises with the correct form. I am older and have some physical issues.  He works with me to help improve my mobility and flexibility.  That really helps me alot.  I am a nurse and work 12 hours shifts three days a week.  Hugheston helps me immensely.  I could keep going on and on but I want everyone to know that the Hoover 24e is a great place to get healthy and fit.  I've never been uncomfortable or felt out of place.  If I have questions Daniel or Hugheston makes sure to help me find the answers.  So if you want to get fit or just be healthy come see what the gym is all about.

name: Chris Ehrixh
text: Great gym. Love it.

resp.text: Thanks Chris!

name: Cameron White
text: Great staff, great regulars, and most importantly great gym.

name: Jeff Randle
text: This fitness club is HUGE with so many options for literally anything you could want to do. The cardio equipment is all the way on the other side of the gym from the free weights so the people who don't want to mingle don't have to. If machines are your thing, they have any and all that you can imagine. They've really tried to cover every base with this gym.

name: Shantavia
text: At first i thought it was a wonderful gym and i didnt mind pay 30 dollars a month then a family emergency came up so i could no longer pay for the personal trainer i decided to get the trainer understood but the managers couldnt i wouldnt recommend anyone to go to this gym

name: ZbzDogo Outdoors
text: worst customer service at a gym I have ever encountered. out dated equipment. do your self a favor and join a different gym

name: Jackancoke
text: Great gym

resp.text: Thanks Michael!!

name: Nicholas Keith
text: Love it.

resp.text: Thanks Nicholas! That is great to hear!!

name: William Caldwell
text: Great clean gym

resp.text: Thanks William! That is great to hear!!

name: Jonathan Murray
text: The best

resp.text: Thanks Jonathan! We also have the best members!!

name: Todd Sobel
text: Great equipment

resp.text: Thanks Todd!!

name: Herman Mattingly
text: Awesome Gym

name: Clay Hasenfuss
text: Weights and Cardio

name: Joseph Felix
text: Convenient for all levels

name: Cutty Dean
text: Love this place

name: Bethany Cusimano
text: Everything you need, just older

name: Charlie Graham
text: No Cooling Off Period or Try It Out Time. I joined this gym and after going five times did not feel like it was the right fit for me, and did not like going to a gym without staff at night. When I contacted Daniel at the gym and asked if I could cancel I was told my only options were to pay a $150 or finish out the contact without using the gym if I did not like it. He said it did not matter that I had only been a member for less than a two weeks. So beware they do not offer a trial period - join and if you do not like it pay their fee.

name: Ray Gamble
text: Absolutely Terrible!!

name: dez davis
text:
Ripoff

Horrible customer service and overpriced memberships

name: TIM CASTELLON
text: Great place to workout, staff is awesome!
